view

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • view.GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class draws the main GameWindow, with the board and the state passed to it by the controller. This class acts as the main access to the 'view' in an MVC type setup. it provides all the function to manipulate the view.
    Author:
    {}rpheus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
